title: PromptSAGRequest
description: Schema describing prompt engineering requests for PromptSAG.

id.description: Identifier for the prompt engineering task.

version.description: Schema version for the request payload.

objective.description: High-level goal describing what the prompt should accomplish.

constraints.description: List of constraints, guardrails, or restrictions that must be respected.

references.description: Reference documents, URLs, or AGENTS.md entries relevant to the prompt.

target_models.description: Names of target models or providers the prompt will be used with.

evaluation.description: Expected verification steps (tests, lint commands, manual review).
